title.rendered: Accent Equity invests in Global Attractions SPI

content.rendered:
Mannheimer Swartling has assisted the investment fund Accent Equity 2017 L.P. in acquiring a majority stake in Global Attractions SPI from its founders and management. The company’s CEO and other key employees will reinvest and continue to develop the group in close cooperation with Accent Equity.

Global Attractions SPI is a European market leader in equipment for indoor playgrounds and other leisure related activities, and offers turn-key services ranging from concept development and design to production and installation. The group has local presence in fifteen countries and a wide distributor base in twelve countries, together covering five continents. Having grown on average ca 12% per year since 2015, the group now turnovers approximately SEK 330 million across a global customer base including operators of Family Entertainment Centres, hotels, airports and restaurants.
